item.title: WATCH: Couple walks down flooded aisle on their wedding day in Philippines
item.description: This couple in the Philippines was determined to walk down the aisle on their wedding day. Even if it meant walking down a flooded one.

item.title: WATCH: Ozzy Osbourne, Black Sabbath legend, dead at 76
item.description: Ozzy Osbourne, famed Black Sabbath frontman and heavy metal pioneer, has died at 76.

item.title: Video shows glimpse inside migrant facility in Manhattan: 'Like dogs'

item.title: WATCH: Deputy AG Blanche says he will meet with Ghislaine Maxwell 'in the coming days'
item.description: ABC News' Katherine Faulders says this may indicate a "new norm" at the Department of Justice.
